text: is a professional tennis player. She won the 2018 US Open, defeating American Serena Williams in the final. This made her the first Japanese player to win a Grand Slam singles tournament. In 2019 she won the Australian Open and became world number 1. She turned professional in September 2013. Osaka is Haitian- American-Japanese. She was born in Chūō-ku, Osaka. Her father is Haitian- American and her mother is Japanese. She grew up in the United States. She has both Japanese and American citizenship. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Competitors at the 2020 Summer Olympics Category:American tennis players Category:Australian Open champions Category:Japanese tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Osaka Category:US Open (tennis) champions Category:World No. 1 tennis players
title: Naomi Osaka
